page.title: 04Employment and Leisure
page.content: Engineering proved to be the most popular job other people were involved in computers and nursing.The majority of people worked in Guildford although others found employment in Godalming and London.The average number of hours worked in a week was 40.Most people had worked for an average of 10 years with their company. In a survey of parents it was found that while Godalming Leisure Centre was not widely used tennis, squash and badminton proved the most popular sporting activities. Many suggested they would like to see a cinema, theatre or ice rink. Television proved to be the most common form of home entertainment the average viewing time being 10 hours a week.
